docstring.long_description:
Inputs
------
primary_trace : OrderedPair|DataFrame|Matrix|Vector
    the DataContainer to be visualized as the first figure

secondary_trace : OrderedPair|DataFrame|Matrix|Vector
    the DataContainer to be visualized as the second figure
docstring.short_description: Create a combination of Plotly visualizations for a given input data container.

parameters.name: first_figure
parameters.description: plotly type to display as the first figure, default is 'scatter'

parameters.name: second_figure
parameters.description: plotly type to display as the second figure, default is 'line'

returns.description: the DataContainer containing Plotly visualization of both figures
